mainText:
Well I'm a PC guy who has slowly been converting somewhat to Apple products
like my iPod touch, my shuffle and my iPhone. I would like to pass on my
condolences to the Job's Family and all the Apple employees who will miss
this great man and his vision and passion brought everything Apple to the
fore front of computing with their products and excellent service. He was a
class act guy in my opinion who will be missed by many... world wide!!
author: Anonymous
